sentence.Network_en: Somalia, pop. 7.9 million, income per head about £1.60 a week.
sentence.Network_cn: 索马里，人口790万，人均收入大约每周1.60英镑。

sentence.Network_en: The President is about to wind up his visit to Somalia.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统即将结束对索马里的访问。

sentence.Network_en: The Canadians plan to deliver more food to southern Somalia.
sentence.Network_cn: 加拿大计划向索马里南部地区运送更多的食品。
